subject: Anyone use jSwat to debug JUnit tests?
msgSnippet: I use jswat to debug my web apps but can t seem to figure out how I would connect jswat to a unit test since jswat runs off of a port. Any ideas would be
messageBody:
I use jswat to debug my web apps but can't seem to
figure out how I would connect jswat to a unit test
since jswat runs off of a port. Any ideas would be
greatly appreciated.

thanks

- Billy -
